messages.content: I love this. you get a favorite.
the knock off names are super cringey but i love looking for them
I really love how this team responds to injuries
I'm loving the possibility of fighting a Chimera in the DLC.
I live downtown and walk around at odd hours of the night all the time. Love the empty and abandoned feel of the city.
Damn, sometimes I love people here.
OMG she reminds me of Ginger from Ginger Snaps! I'm in love!
The black beans were there hidden within the rice!! :) gotta love those legumes
I love this contract structure especially since [NAME] is only 31.
You freakin wizard, I love this.
I love my kids. I don't always like my kids, but I love them.
My dad loves playing sport......the sport of slam dunking my arse for a touchdown
Omg two little blankets for your penis. LOVE THAT.
Flair checking in! I love it when they don't change the template messages!
This guy is a little turd but I love him so dearly. I'll pass on your kisses :)
gotta love the random spidey head to the left on the third shelf
I just love that this is appropriate for football now/again. #FuckLA
I love this. I really want to hug [NAME] now.
> a complete ham sandwich Love this. Using this.
I love you like a love song, baby. And if you know that song, it's now in your head.
It's so weird having HGs up this early, but I love having something to watch before my 8am lecture starts.
This is why I love politics. It really shows how stupid people are.
Used to love Thai-tanic. Haven't been in ages.
I love how his armor got bigger and bigger as he got progressively fatter.
I love this!!! You got it!
I love many fanarts of this paring, but this is one of my favorite ones. :)
